summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 1.7°C) and outside temperature (down 1.6°C), more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 5%), and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.3 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in pressure (down 6 mbar), rainfall (up 0.3 mm), light levels (up 2995 lux), and cloud levels (up 443 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1377 m), rainfall (down 0.1 mm), and light levels (up 5346 lux) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s cloud levels is 442.6m lower than yesterday, 977.5m lower than past week, 1376.6m lower than past month.

Yesterday, cloud levels hit a low of 860m and a high of 3110m, averaging 1430.7m; the past week and month reported somewhat higher averages.
cloud levels.summary: A high cloud base will mean mostly sunny conditions.

summary.summary: Inside; comfortable and pleasant temperatures. Outside; the temperature will feel nicely warm and pleasant. Also, oppressively muggy and sticky. Showers, a high cloud base will mean mostly sunny conditions, and some sunny spells will occur. Low pressure may lead to stormy or rainy weather.
